title: Taxi service website - detailed design description
overview: Modernní, luxusně-minimalistický design webové stránky taxislužby s důrazem na konverzi (rezervaci). Kombinace žluté a černé s čistým bílým prostorem. Vizuálně orientováno na hero sekci s formulářem pro rezervaci, doplněné o sekce: vlastnosti, o nás, reference, často kladené dotazy a kontaktní prvky.

layout.grid: responsive 12-column grid with 24px gutters on desktop, collapsing to single-column on mobile

sections.name: header
sections.content: Logo (left), navigation links (center / right), primary CTA 'Book A Taxi' (right). Transparent over hero background on desktop, solid white on scroll.
sections.notes: Sticky header with slight blur and shadow when scrolled

sections.name: hero
sections.content: Large background image (taxi in city) with dark gradient overlay, prominent H1 'Book Taxi For Your Ride' and short subtitle. To the right (or centered on mobile) card-like booking form with inputs for pickup/dropoff, date & time, passengers and a yellow primary CTA button.
sections.background: image with dark overlay (linear-gradient rgba(0,0,0,0.45) -> rgba(0,0,0,0.25))
sections.visual_priority: hero and booking form are primary conversion drivers

sections.name: features
sections.content: Horizontal cards showing three to four features (Safety Guarantee, Fast Pickup, Affordable Rate, etc.) with small circular icon, short title and one-line description.

sections.name: about
sections.content: Two-column layout: image on left, text block on right with 'We Provide Trusted Service...' headline, bullets and a secondary CTA 'Contact Us'.
sections.image_style: rounded rectangle with soft shadow and small badge '30 Years of Service' overlapping corner

sections.name: testimonials
sections.content: Carousel or grid of testimonial cards with photo, name/title, short quote and 5-star indicator. Uses white cards with subtle shadow on a dark/toned section.

sections.name: faq
sections.content: Accordion style FAQ list with question toggles and short answers, placed on a pale background with supporting image on the left in desktop layout.

sections.name: call_to_action_strip
sections.content: Full-width section with checkerboard or taxi-pattern accent and bold headline 'Book Your Cab It's Simple And Affordable' with CTA button.

sections.name: footer
sections.content: Compact footer with contact information, quick links, small newsletter signup, social icons. Dark text on light or dark background variant.

primary.usage: Main actions (Book Taxi Now, About Us)

inputs.style: rounded, elevated white inputs with light border and inner padding
inputs.icons: small inline icons for location, calendar, passenger

badges.style: small rounded badge with bold text, used on images like '30 Years of Quality Service'

icons.style: line icons with filled accent circles for emphasis

interactions.transitions: ease-out 200ms for micro-interactions, 350ms for larger transitions
interactions.form_validation: inline validation with green check or red error, subtle shake for invalid submit

responsive_behavior.desktop: two-column hero: text left, booking form right; features in a row; testimonials grid 3 columns
responsive_behavior.tablet: stacked hero with smaller booking card, features 2 columns, testimonials 2 columns
responsive_behavior.mobile: single column: hero text above, booking form full width below, features stacked, large tappable CTAs, sticky bottom booking CTA option

accessibility.contrast: ensure 4.5:1 contrast for primary text on background; yellow #f4b400 used only on white/black elements where contrast meets guidelines
accessibility.focus_states: visible focus outlines for keyboard nav, 3px ring using primary_dark
accessibility.aria: ARIA labels on form elements, accordion has roles 'button' and 'region' with aria-expanded
accessibility.alt_text: all decorative images have empty alt; content images include descriptive alt text for screen readers

hero_image.description: photo of taxi/city street with shallow depth of field, warm tone

assets_and_images.icons: SVG sprite for feature icons and UI icons

developer_notes: Prefer svg icons and system fonts to reduce load time.
Use progressive image loading (lqip) and responsive srcset for hero.
Keep booking form accessible and keyboard-navigable; prefer native <input type='datetime-local'> with fallback.
Consider A/B testing CTA text and booking card placement.
